isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - HEATING, VENTILATION, AND AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC) TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - HEATER AND AIR CONDITIONER (CAB)

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: This service manual section applies to 9200, 9300, and 9400 Models with Pro Sleeper and Skyrise Sleeper. The section should be used with Circuit Diagram Book CTS-5273.

The heater/air conditioning system has a blower motor circuit and a compressor control circuit. The compressor control circuit is tied to the blower motor circuit which can be set to off, low, medium or high speed to circulate heat or cooling throughout the cab.
